strapiPost.title: Hogs Everywhere
strapiPost.content:
The moment you Razorback fans have been waiting for: Hogs+ is here.

  • Woo Pig Platform: Hogs+ is a streaming network created to provide exclusive content to Razorback fans, and it launches today! The platform is subscription based and costs $7.99/mo. 
  • In the club: If subscribers are not already a Razorback Foundation member, they will receive a complimentary membership. Which means, you could have access to behind the scenes with your favorite teams as well as get discounts on their merchandise. 

For more information click HERE.
